Half Life Alyx
Masne NI

My second favorite Half Life installment next to Half Life Opposing Force. I love the style, the stunning graphics and how well they run, the map design, the smooth flow of progress from place to place. Every battle is somewhat difficult for me (I play hard mode and I suck at shooters), especially the Hunters, but I do love them for it. Honestly, even if we're most definitely getting HL3 after HL Alyx, this game would've been the best game in the franchise to end it on thus far.
I've got nothing bad to say about this one, it was my first ever introduction to the series from my friend and it remains a timeless masterpiece just like all the other games in this brilliantly made universe.

10 из 10 прошёл ещё в 2016 году 2 эпизод, после его прохождение думал 3 часть выйдет через года 2-3 а когда посмотрел на дату выхода последнего эпизода (2007 год) то понял что прошло 9 лет, а 3 часть молчала  
мод на 3 эпизод это было не то что хотели фанаты серии игр Half-Life (Полу-Жизнь) и я надеялся что 3 часть всё же выйдет и Гейб дочитает до 3 но. На сегоднешний день я уже потерял надежду на рассвет 3 эпизода. Печальна концовка...

Questo gioco è sicuramente stimolante e basato su una storia intrigante e abbastanza al di fuori dagli schemi....piena di colpi di scena e di "livelli" complessi da superare, sia attraverso la velocità di azione sia attraverso l'agilità mentale e il pensiero strategico. I personaggi sono già noti a chi conosce Half Life da un po' e continuano ad esercitare il loro fascino a prescindere dalla loro "età" (considerato che il gioco ha un po' di anni ormai e non si è ancora avuto il rilascio di Half Life 3). Super consigliato!!! Nonostante i bei panorami e le scene sia in esterno sia in interno, penso di poter dire che il gioco non richiede una grossa potenza grafica, considerato che può girare sul mio vecchio portatile. Da provare assolutamente!!!! Io gli darei 5 stelle senza dubbio!!!! Buon divertimento!!! ...e quello che ho detto vale chiaramente per tutti gli episodi della saga Half Life!
ИГРА ВАУ ВАУ ПЛАКАЛ КАК ЖЕ КРУТО
Это просто круть

Самый последний эпизод который вышел через год после выхода Episode One.
Визуально игру очень неплохо подтянули,особенно это видно на открытых локациях.
А вот в геймплее в этот раз было побольше новшеств, это и давка личинок муравьиных львов,и поиск тайников по радару,и уничтожение страйдера с помощью бомбы и грави пушки
Сюжет в это игре плавно продолжает историю законченную на первом эпизоде,Аликс всё также нас сопровождает а мы все больше привязываемся к ней.Но именно этот эпизод оставил за собой жирнющий клиффхэнгер,и тогда и начались все те шуточки про Half-Life 2: Episode Three.
Но прошло много времени и именно в конце 2019 года Valve показала нам Half-Life: Alyx,надежда на возвращение серии теперь снова появилась в сердцах фанатов,лично я жду эту игру (хоть она и для вр)

GOOD GAME

With the completion of this, my 35 hour Half-Life experience ends. This chapter is great. Looks great, plays great, and some of the gameplay improvements really add to the experience (flashlight being on a separate bar from sprint, thank you). The driving sections looked amazing and reminded me of Highway 17. The final open area where you fight the striders is tense and a nice change of pace from the corridors of older parts of the series, and the ending is just great. Too bad we had, and still have to, wait twelve and a half years for another game in the series, and probably won't get a proper sequel till Valve decides to sacrifices the rest of the TF2 team to a demon or something.

\\\ MASSIVE "MY OPINION" WARNING, DON'T BE A DICK ///

I fucking hate episode 2...

...not really, but I do have some problems with it.
First of all, it is completely overrated, mostly just due to HL2's original problems with balancing
and while it does have some highlights, it tends to just drag on too much during the on-foot
sections around the beginning and that last strider fight.

V I S U A L S
EP2 also kind of lacks in some truly stunning enviroments, I like White Forest but the CSS trees get a bit old once you play more than twice, I especially understand it when Valve's plan was to have EP3 in an artic setting, and thus making all episodes unique... We ALL know how that turned out, leaving us with a somewhat generic forest enviroment we've seen already on other games as the last variation of HL's eviroments. 
Some small towns look good, as well as the usual combine controlled outposts, but they're nothing compared to the change from Black Mesa, to City 17, to its beautiful nightmarishly red EP1 counterpart.

G A M E P L A Y
What I said about balancing earlier isn't just a simple problem and I don't know why Valve never tried to rethink it, and the fact they didn't makes the "fun" factor fall completely on the hands of the map design that turns it very hit or miss.

S T O R Y
Good actually, very very good! My only problems with it are 
- the already mentioned for the 100th time: rough introduction of Dr. Magnusson; 
- The rebels's sudden change from a ragtag rebellious team to an army;
- and Gman's "hidden" appearences*
(*By this I mean how him showing up on a forest is kind of weird, the very noticeable kind. In HL1-HL2's Gman appearences they certainly feel off, in a creppy subtle way. There is no way he could have gotten there that fast before you, either because you are simply going faster or that an alien empire made business men extinct.)

F U R T H E R        S T U F F
Its a Half Life game and thus must suffer from Valve's ignorance to fix its gamebreaking problems, the real ones, the OBJECTIVE ones. The fact that getting hit ONCE by an antlion worker makes your screen flash up until the GAME ENDS.

C O N C L U S I O N
bad game, uninstall...
